TEXT: CARDINAL . Mrs PERSON is a doctor employed at the local health unit ( “ the ORG ” ) in GPE , where she lives .

CARDINAL . On DATE she instituted proceedings in ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) for judicial review of a decision of the ORG assigning her , at the time when she was recruited to a permanent post , to a staff category lower than the one to which she considered herself to be entitled .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant asked for a date to be fixed for the hearing .
CARDINAL . According to the information supplied at the hearing before the ORG by the applicant 's representative , the proceedings were then still pending .
